sourcesContent:
import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import React,{useState} from "react"; import { Table } from "reactstrap"; const Dashboard=()=>{ const [currentState,setCurrentState]=useState(AppState.SCHEDULE); const [name,setName]=useState("Maaz"); const [email,setEmail]=useState("2017ee83@student.uet.edu.pk"); const [section,setSection]=useState(["A","B"]); const params=useParams(); const [lectures,setLectures]=useState({ Lecture1:["Database(Class 123:A)","Machine Learning(Class 125)","Computer Networks(Class 126)","Computer Architecture(Class 127)","Database Lab(Class 211)",null,null], Lecture2:["Machine Learning(Class 125)",null,"Operation Systems(Class 225)",null,"Database Lab(Class 212)",null,null], Lecture3:["Operation Systems(Class 125)","Machine Learning(Class 123:A)","Computer Architecture(Class 225)",null,"Database Lab(Class 126)",null,null], Lecture4:[null,"Computer Networks Lab(Class 126)","Machine Learning(Class 123:A)","Computer Architecture(Class 225)","Database Lab(Class 127)",null,null], Lecture5:["Database(Class 211)",null,"Computer Networks(Class 225)","Machine Learning Lab(Class 126)",null,null,null], Lecture6:["Machine Learning(Class 123:A)","Operation Systems(Class 125)","Database(Class 126)",null,null,null,null], }); const [assignments,setAssignments]=useState({ monday:{ Assignment:null, VenueDeadline:null, Quiz:"Operating Systems Quiz", Venue:"Class 123:A", }, tuesday:{ Assignment:"Database", Deadline:"11-00PM", Quiz:"Machine Learning Quiz", Venue:"Class 123:A", }, wednesday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, Quiz:null, Venue:null }, thursday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, Quiz:null, Venue:null }, friday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, Quiz:null, Venue:null }, saturday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, Quiz:null, Venue:null }, sunday:{ Assignment:"Machine Learning", Deadline:"12-00PM", Quiz:null, Venue:null } }) const handleAddQuiz=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return(
{name} ({`${parseInt(params.id)===1?"Teacher":"Student"}`})
{email}
{ setCurrentState(AppState.SCHEDULE) }}> Schedules:
{section.map((sec)=>{ return( <>
  • Section {sec}
    • ) })}
    { parseInt(params.id)===1 && <>
    { setCurrentState(AppState.CHANGE_SCHEDULE); }}> Change Schedule
    { setCurrentState(AppState.ADD_QUIZ); }}> Quizes
    { setCurrentState(AppState.ADD_ASSIGNMENT) }}> Assignments
    }
    Your Next Week Schedule
    {currentState===AppState.SCHEDULE && <>
    {lectures.Lecture1.map((lec1,index)=>{ return( <> ) })} {lectures.Lecture2.map((lec2,index)=>{ return( <> ) })} {lectures.Lecture3.map((lec3,index)=>{ return( <> ) })} {lectures.Lecture4.map((lec4,index)=>{ return( <> ) })} {lectures.Lecture5.map((lec5,index)=>{ return( <> ) })} {lectures.Lecture6.map((lec6,index)=>{ return( <> ) })}
    Time Monday Tuessday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday
    Lecture 1{lec1 || "-"}
    Lecture 2{lec2 || "-"}
    Lecture 3{lec3 || "-"}
    Lecture 4{lec4 || "-"}
    Lecture 5{lec5 || "-"}
    Lecture 6{lec6 || "-"}
    Quizes {assignments.monday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.monday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.tuesday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.tuesday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.wednesday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.wednesday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.thursday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.thursday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.friday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.friday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.saturday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.saturday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""} {assignments.sunday.Quiz || "-"}{assignments.sunday.Venue?`(${assignments.monday.Venue})`:""}
    Assignments {assignments.monday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.monday.Deadline?`(${assignments.monday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.tuesday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.tuesday.Deadline?`(${assignments.tuesday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.wednesday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.wednesday.Deadline?`(${assignments.wednesday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.thursday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.thursday.Deadline?`(${assignments.thursday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.friday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.friday.Deadline?`(${assignments.friday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.saturday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.saturday.Deadline?`(${assignments.saturday.Deadline})`:""} {assignments.sunday.Assignment || "-"}{assignments.sunday.Deadline?`(${assignments.sunday.Deadline})`:""}
    } { currentState===AppState.CHANGE_SCHEDULE && <>
    Add Lecture
    {handleAddQuiz(e)}}> Add
    Edit Existing Lecture
    } { currentState===AppState.ADD_QUIZ && <>
    Add Quiz
    handleAddQuiz(e)} className="d-flex flex-column">
    {handleAddQuiz(e)}}> Add
    Edit Quiz
    handleAddQuiz(e)} className="d-flex flex-column">
    {handleAddQuiz(e)}}> Edit
    } { currentState===AppState.ADD_ASSIGNMENT && <>
    Add Assignment
    handleAddQuiz(e)} className="d-flex flex-column">
    {handleAddQuiz(e)}}> Add
    Edit Assignment
    handleAddQuiz(e)} className="d-flex flex-column">
    {handleAddQuiz(e)}}> Edit
    }
    ) }; export class AppState{ static SCHEDULE="schedule"; static CHANGE_SCHEDULE="change_shecdule"; static ADD_QUIZ="add_quiz"; static ADD_ASSIGNMENT="add_assignment"; } export default Dashboard;
